movies.title: Strawberry Shortcake: The Sweet Dreams Movie
movies.plot: Strawberry Shortcake has a dream of fresh new fields of berry bushes - enough for everyone. But when the greedy Peculiar Purple Pieman rolls into Strawberry Land, he decides to steal Strawberry's dream - and everyone else's dreams too. In order to stop the Purple Pieman and his evil plan, Strawberry and her friends must travel to the Land of Dreams. Along the way, these special friends learn the value of working together to make dreams come true.

biography.bio: Sarah Heinke was born on August 24, 1990 in Omaha, Nebraska, USA as Sarah Kathleen Heinke. She is known for her work on Strawberry Shortcake: Meet Strawberry Shortcake (2003), Strawberry Shortcake: Spring for Strawberry Shortcake (2003) and Strawberry Shortcake: Get Well Adventure (2003).
biography.name: Sarah Heinke

biography.bio: Rachel Ware is an actress, known for Strawberry Shortcake: The Sweet Dreams Movie (2006), Strawberry Shortcake: Meet Strawberry Shortcake (2003) and Strawberry Shortcake: Spring for Strawberry Shortcake (2003).
biography.name: Rachel Ware
